property.name: text
property.value: Every five seconds, suppress the output for five seconds.

property.name: text
property.value: This illustrates that sending to my own input is delayed by one microstep. The suppress input with value true occurs at time (5.0,0), but the produce inputs all occur at microstep 1. So the suppress inputs never have any effect.

property.name: script
description
property.value: This accessor produces outputs periodically, at one second intervals, as long as the most recently received suppress input is not true. The output is a count of the firing, starting with 1.

property.name: error (port)
property.value: The error message if an error occurs. If this port is not connected and an error occurs, then an exception is thrown instead.

property.name: suppress (port-parameter)
property.value: If true, then suppress the output triggered by a callback.

property.name: produce (port)
property.value: An event here is produced as an output, unless suppressed.

property.name: script
note
property.value: NOTE: To see the script, invoke Open Actor

property.name: description
property.value: Accessor that stops execution of the enclosing swarmlet when it receives an input with value true. It does this by identifying the top-level enclosing composite accessor and invoking wrapup on it.

property.name: stop (port)
property.value: A signal with value true to stop the swarmlet.
